headline: BofA says the chip reshuffle makes Nvidia a 'compelling' value play
summary: As equipment makers hit pricey peaks, BofA urges investors to reshuffle toward "dependable customers" like Nvidia and AMD to navigate the next leg of the AI trade.

headline: ASML Holding Before Q4 Earnings: How Should Investors Play the Stock?
summary: ASML heads into Q4 earnings with AI-driven chip demand, strong EUV momentum and revenues projected to be EURO 9.8B - should investors buy now or wait?

headline: Which Semiconductor Equipment Stock Has More Upside in 2026?
summary: As AI chip demand continues to heat up, which of these three companies making equipment vital to chipmaking will be most dominant?
